byline.contributor: Jan Richter contributed reporting from Prague.

abstract: United States military convoy of 120 armored vehicles, accompanied by more than 500 American troops, takes 1,100-mile journey through six European countries, mingling with locals and reassuring allies; Operation Dragoon Ride is meant as part public relations ploy, part training exercise and part signal to Russia.
lead_paragraph: Operation Dragoon Ride, consisting of 120 armored vehicles and more than 500 American troops, was envisioned as part public relations event, part training exercise and part signal to Russia.

headline.main: An American Military Convoy in Europe Aims to Reassure Allies
headline.print_headline: On a Drive to Hearten Tense Allies

snippet: Operation Dragoon Ride, consisting of 120 armored vehicles and more than 500 American troops, was envisioned as part public relations event, part training exercise and part signal to Russia.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
